rca_example.issue: Battery voltage drop in V01-V05 batch
rca_example.root_cause: Supplier quality issue - Terminal corrosion in batch QX2024
rca_example.analysis: Chemical analysis reveals improper coating on battery terminals leading to accelerated corrosion
evidence: Lab test results showing coating thickness 20% below spec

capa_example.corrective_action: Replace all affected batteries from batch QX2024
capa_example.preventive_action: Enhanced incoming quality inspection for battery terminals
capa_example.verification: Inspect next 100 batteries for coating thickness
